ygData.subject: eqbards: where we've been and where we're going
ygData.msgSnippet: Well met fellow bards a few things for the records. 1.  We have over 300 members on this list, more then all of the other everquest bard lists combined. 2.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Well met fellow bards a few things for the records.

1. We have over 300 members on this list, more then all of the other everquest bard lists combined.

2. I have sent messages to the other 4 mailing list moderators to try to get them to join their lists with ours.

3. The next issue of the newsletter is comming out soon and I still need some submissions please send them to lol@... thanks.

4. Some people have been complaining about getting up to 100 messages a day, sorry about this but its a good thing as we have been called the most intelligent EQ list on the onelist servers, so here a few ideas to try...

Set eqbards to send you the digest instead of every email idividually.

Set your email program to filter all eqbards messages to thier own folder.

Create a free email account such as yahoo or hotmail, just for your eqbards messages.

Thanks to you all and keep up the wonderfull work helping each other.

See you online
Torenithus Legendmaker
Gentleman Bard of Qeynos
